location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 2: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to [John Beaumont and George Green, Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont and George Green, East India Company officials at Bushire. The letter reports the departure of French and British ambassadors from London and Paris, following the signing of a Treaty of Commerce between France and the USA. The letter speculates on the likelihood of an outbreak of war between Britain and France.
